originalText.text:
I was looking for a good barber for a long time. I have been going to him for a haircut for more than one year and can say Dmitry is a really professional and talented barber.
His job always has resulted in a height level, good and friendly atmosphere, and only positive emotions!
I recommend him!

text.text:
I was looking for a good barber for a long time. I have been going to him for a haircut for more than one year and can say Dmitry is a really professional and talented barber.
His job always has resulted in a height level, good and friendly atmosphere, and only positive emotions!
I recommend him!

originalText.text:
The only place I trust for my haircuts and I always have a fantastic experience. From the moment I walk in, I am greeted warmly by the receptionist and offered a beverage while I wait for my stylist.

My stylist, Dmitry, is incredibly skilled and attentive. He listens carefully to my requests and offers his suggestions, resulting in a haircut that is both flattering and easy to maintain. Throughout the appointment, he is friendly and engaging, making me feel comfortable and at ease.

The salon itself is clean and stylish, with a relaxed atmosphere that makes me feel like I am in good hands. The products they use are high quality, and I appreciate that they take the time to explain each one and how it will benefit my hair.

Overall, I highly recommend the DP Hair salon to anyone looking for a top-notch haircut and a great salon experience. The staff is professional, friendly, and skilled, and I live feeling like a million bucks. I will definitely be returning for my next haircut!

originalText.text:
I had an amazing experience. Not only my make up and hair were perfect on my wedding day but Dmitrii was checking on me the whole time, how I feel, do I like it and am I comfortable. As well as took couple of pictures, that was so lovely. I truly enjoyed myself being in his care.
I’ve got so many compliments on my make up that day. It is all because of Dmitrii!

text.text:

I’ve got so many compliments on my make up that day. It is all because of Dmitrii!

originalText.text: I truly cannot say enough wonderful things about Dmitrii. Not only is he a phenomenal makeup artist and a hairstylist, but what an incredible human being. His talent, artistry, sweet and genuine personality are pretty much perfection.  Dmitrii has a perfect eye and the perfect touch. He is my go-to artist for any occasion I might have. I am always blown away at how beautiful, sophisticated, and yet natural my makeup and hair look after I visit his salon. Whether it’s a date night or a special occasion, he always does an exceptional job, and the results are simply stunning. I highly recommend him!!!

originalText.text: Dmitri is a true professional at his works. DPhair is a welcoming environment and truly a place of talent. I have a pretty complicated color of hair to work with originally, so turning it to blonde the way I wanted to gets me multiple compliments - all because of Dmitri. Only he was able to achieve my complete hair makeover that I wanted. I wholeheartedly recommend Dmitri and DPhair.
